body:
For thou shall receive God's grace, your sins will be forgiven and all your curses cleared. Spread the word to your brothers and sisters to be impervious to all evil. For everytime you do this, you will be cleansed and gain an additional year of immunity. 
God's grace can't be broken, it is the absolute will! 

So go forth and help others and their friends and loved ones from their terrible demise.
